text: The 2019–20 season was FC Viktoria Plzeň's 27th season in the Czech First League. The team competed in the Czech First League, the Czech Cup, and the UEFA Champions League. ==First team squad== . Retired at around 2014 due to a terminal disease. A ceremonial inclusion on the team's roster.
